standardRacialTraits.blurb: One or two sentance blurb about humans

base.speed: Humans have a base speed of 30 feet.

racial.name: Bonus Feat
racial.description: Humans select one extra feat at 1st level.

racial.name: Skilled
racial.description: Humans gain an additional skill rank at first level and one additional rank whenever they gain a level.

standardRacialTraits.blurb: One or two sentance blurb about elves

base.speed: Elves have a base speed of 30 feet.

racial.name: Elven Immunities
racial.description: Elves are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells and effects.

racial.name: Keen Senses
racial.description: Elves receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.

racial.name: Elven Magic
racial.description: Elves receive a +2 racial bonus on caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance. In addition, elves receive a +2 racial bonus on Spellcraft skill checks made to identify the properties of magic items.

racial.name: Weapon Familiarity
racial.description: Elves are proficient with longbows (including composite longbows), longswords, rapiers, and shortbows (including composite shortbows), and treat any weapon with the word “elven” in its name as a martial weapon.

racial.name: Low-Light Vision
racial.description: Elves can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

standardRacialTraits.blurb: One or two sentance blurb about dwarves

base.speed: (Slow and Steady) Dwarves have a base speed of 20 feet, but their speed is never modified by armor or encumbrance.

racial.name: Defensive Training
racial.description: Dwarves gain a +4 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant subtype.

racial.name: Hardy
racial.description: Dwarves gain a +4 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant subtype.

racial.name: Stability
racial.description: Dwarves gain a +4 racial bonus to their Combat Maneuver Defense when resisting a bull rush or trip attempt while standing on the ground.

racial.name: Greed
racial.description: Dwarves gain a +2 racial bonus on Appraise checks made to determine the price of non-magical goods that contain precious metals or gemstones.

racial.name: Stonecunning
racial.description: Dwarves gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks to notice unusual stonework, such as traps and hidden doors located in stone walls or floors. They receive a check to notice such features whenever they pass within 10 feet of them, whether or not they are actively looking.

racial.name: Darkvision
racial.description: Dwarves can see perfectly in the dark up to 60 feet.

racial.name: Hatred
racial.description: Dwarves gain a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the orc and goblinoid subtypes because of their special training against these hated foes.

racial.name: Weapon Familiarity
racial.description: Dwarves are proficient with battleaxes, heavy picks, and warhammers, and treat any weapon with the word “dwarven” in its name as a martial weapon.
